mushy_01.title: Once upon a time...

on_start.start_message: Cast Strength from your spellbook, then head out to the Forest and find some opponents.

mushy_01.summary_pre: A tiny mushroom offers help but warns the forest is deadly.
mushy_01.summary_active: Use the 'Strength' spell to boost your stats temporariy.  Fight opponents in the forest, and recruit three mushroom babies then fuse them at the temple.
dialog: Hi there! I’m Mushy. Nice to meet you! You and I may be low-level now. If we head into the forest like this, we won’t stand much chance against the monsters we’d find.
But I have a little secret. I can teach you a couple basic spells to boost our stats. They’ll use MP, and the effects wear off over time.
Life Boost adds 10 HP to your max life, and Strength adds 10 points to both Attack and Defense.
Let me break it down: these effects cost MP to cast, and they stack. With a few casts, you’ll be strong enough to trample some monsters.

Stat boosts won’t carry into the next day, so if you rest at the Inn, the effects reset. Resting also fully restores your HP and MP, so the next day you can recast the spells and power up before heading out again.

If you take me with you, I’ll teach you these two spells and we can take down some enemies together. They’ll reward us with XP and GP. While battling, we can also recruit two more baby mushrooms using the “Socialize” feature. Once you have three baby mushrooms on the team, the priestess at the temple can merge us into a stronger Mushroom.
So what do you say? Let me join you, and let’s see how we fare against real monsters.
Let Mushy join your team and he’ll teach you Life Boost and Strength. (Start Quest)

mushy_02.title: Wandcraft
mushy_02.summary_pre: The alchemist can fuse gear into stronger forms.
mushy_02.summary_active: Buy 3 Oak Wands and fuse them into 1 by visiting the Alchemist.
dialog: Wands can store charges, letting you cast spells without spending MP. To use a wand in battle, you must equip it on yourself.
Wands can be bought in the Shop, and the Alchemist can fuse gear to combine and increase its power.
Buy 3 Oak Wands and fuse them into one at the Alchemist.

mushy_03.title: Gear up
mushy_03.summary_pre: Mushy urges you to gear up before the next trials.
mushy_03.summary_active: Buy and equip one of each gear type.
dialog: Before we push further, we should gear up. Each slot boosts your stats in a different way.
Swords raise Attack, shields and armor bolster Defense, and rings and bracelets add smaller bonuses.
As you already know, wands hold elemental charges for spells, so be sure to keep one equiped if you plan to cast in battle.
Visit the Shop to buy gear, then equip one item in each slot from your inventory.

mushy_04.title: Beba Hexa
mushy_04.summary_pre: Mushy has a fairy friend who might grow into a queen.
mushy_04.summary_active: Recruit three fairy babies and fuse them into a fairy teen.
dialog: Mushy has a friend to introduce. Her name is Beba, and she is tiny, sparkly, and very dramatic.
She is not strong yet, but Beba is a princess. One day she could grow into a full Fairy Queen.
Beba will cost 100 GP to recruit, but once she joins, other fairies will join for 60 GP each. It is worth it.
If we help her gather a small court, she will blossom faster. That means recruiting a few fairy babies.
Once we have three fairy babies, the temple can fuse them into a stronger fairy teen.
Ready to meet Beba and give her a proper royal escort? (Start Quest)

mushy_05.title: Chase the Moon
mushy_05.summary_pre: A young wolf longs to run beneath the wandering tower’s shadow.
mushy_05.summary_active: Recruit three wolf pups and fuse them into a full wolf.
dialog: Mushy whispers about a wolf pup named Chase who runs the ridge each night, following the moon’s path.
Chase is quick but young, still learning to guard the pack. He wants a team that can keep up with him.
If we help him gather two more wolf pups, the temple can fuse their bond into a full-grown wolf.
A true wolf will give us the bite and grit to face what waits beyond the forest.
Ready to run with Chase and learn the rhythm of the moon? (Start Quest)
